DOCNAME: CASE OF FATEYENKOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the Appendix .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained , inter alia , of the excessive length of civil proceedings and of the lack of an effective remedy in this respect .
